channel.title: CVE Feed for ServiceStack -- all

item.title: CVE-2019-1010199|2024-08-05T03:07:18.472Z -- servicestack -- servicestack%20framework
item.description: ServiceStack ServiceStack Framework 4.5.14 is affected by: Cross Site Scripting (XSS). The impact is: JavaScrpit is reflected in the server response, hence executed by the browser. The component is: the query used in the GET request is prone. The attack vector is: Since there is no server-side validation and If Browser encoding is bypassed, the victim is affected when opening a crafted URL. The fixed version is: 5.2.0.
